allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initialize Nuxt UI starter project with pnpm and additional modules

- Initialize Nuxt 4.2.1 with @nuxt/ui v4.1.0 using official UI starter template
- Add required modules: @nuxt/content, @vite-pwa/nuxt, pinia, @pinia/nuxt, @vueuse/nuxt, nuxt-charts, chart.js, @nuxt/image
- Configure pnpm as package manager (v10.21.0)
- Verify dev server starts successfully at http://localhost:3000
- Nuxt files coexist with existing vanilla JS PWA (to be migrated incrementally)

Story: 1.1 - Initialize Nuxt UI Starter Project
Epic: 1 - Foundation & Infrastructure
EOF
)")
